verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> concerning all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H4024>Migdol<s%>, and at <S%H8471>Tahpanhes<s%>, and at <S%H5297>Noph<s%>, and in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H6624>Pathros<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H935>brought<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and upon all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and, behold, this <S%H3117>day<s%> they are a <S%H2723>desolation<s%>, and no man <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> therein,

<S%H6440>Because<s%> of their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>, in that they <S%H3212>went<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%>, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, whom they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not, neither they, ye, nor your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Howbeit I <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto you all my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Oh, <S%H6213>do<s%> not this <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> that I <S%H8130>hate<s%>.

But they <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not, nor <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, to burn no <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>.

Wherefore my <S%H2534>fury<s%> and mine <S%H639>anger<s%> was poured <S%H5413>forth<s%>, and was <S%H1197>kindled<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and they are <S%H2723>wasted<s%> and <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Therefore now thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Wherefore <S%H6213>commit<s%> ye this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against your <S%H5315>souls<s%>, to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from you <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H5768>child<s%> and <S%H3243>suckling<s%>, <S%H8432>out<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, to <S%H3498>leave<s%> you none to <S%H7611>remain<s%>; out: Heb. out of the midst of Judah

In that ye provoke me unto <S%H3707>wrath<s%> with the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>, burning <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, whither ye be <S%H935>gone<s%> to <S%H1481>dwell<s%>, that ye might cut yourselves <S%H3772>off<s%>, and that ye might be a <S%H7045>curse<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>?

Have ye <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H802>wives<s%>, and your own <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H802>wives<s%>, which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>? wickedness: Heb. wickednesses, or, punishments, etc

They are not <S%H1792>humbled<s%> even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, neither have they <S%H3372>feared<s%>, nor <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H8451>law<s%>, nor in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, that I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%>. humbled: Heb. contrite

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against you for <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that have <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> there, and they shall all be <S%H8552>consumed<s%>, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; they shall even be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>: they shall <S%H4191>die<s%>, from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even unto the <S%H1419>greatest<s%>, by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>: and they shall be an <S%H423>execration<s%>, and an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.

For I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, as I have <S%H6485>punished<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>:

So that none of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which are <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> there, shall <S%H6412>escape<s%> or <S%H8300>remain<s%>, that they should <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, to the which they <S%H5375>have<s%> a <S%H5315>desire<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> there: for none shall <S%H7725>return<s%> but such as shall <S%H6405>escape<s%>. have: Heb. lift up their soul

Then all the <S%H582>men<s%> which <S%H3045>knew<s%> that their <S%H802>wives<s%> had burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and all the <S%H802>women<s%> that stood <S%H5975>by<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>multitude<s%>, even all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in <S%H6624>Pathros<s%>, <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
As for the <S%H1697>word<s%> that thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, we will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto thee.

But we will <S%H6213>certainly<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> whatsoever <S%H1697>thing<s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of our own <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto her, as we have <S%H6213>done<s%>, we, and our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, our <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and our <S%H8269>princes<s%>, in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: for then had we <S%H7646>plenty<s%> of <S%H3899>victuals<s%>, and were <S%H2896>well<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> no <S%H7451>evil<s%>. queen: or, frame of heaven victuals: Heb. bread

But since we left <S%H2308>off<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto her, we have <S%H2637>wanted<s%> all things, and have been <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>.

And when we burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and poured <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto her, did we <S%H6213>make<s%> her <S%H3561>cakes<s%> to <S%H6087>worship<s%> her, and pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto her, <S%H1107>without<s%> our <S%H582>men<s%>? men: or, husbands?

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, to the <S%H1397>men<s%>, and to the <S%H802>women<s%>, and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> which had given him that <S%H1697>answer<s%> <S%H6030><s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

The <S%H7002>incense<s%> that ye <S%H6999>burned<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, ye, and your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, your <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and your <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, did not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> them, and <S%H5927>came<s%> it not into his <S%H3820>mind<s%>?

So that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> no longer <S%H5375>bear<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, and <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which ye have <S%H6213>committed<s%>; therefore is your <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H2723>desolation<s%>, and an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, without an <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

<S%H6440>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> ye have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%>, and because ye have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, nor <S%H1980>walked<s%> in his <S%H8451>law<s%>, nor in his <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, nor in his <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>; therefore this <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H7122>happened<s%> unto you, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Moreover <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and to all the <S%H802>women<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>; Ye and your <S%H802>wives<s%> have both <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, and <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We will <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>perform<s%> our <S%H5088>vows<s%> that we have <S%H5087>vowed<s%>, to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto her: ye will <S%H6965>surely<s%> <S%H6965>accomplish<s%> your <S%H5088>vows<s%>, and <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>perform<s%> your <S%H5088>vows<s%>.

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; Behold, I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall no more be <S%H7121>named<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of any <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>.

Behold, I will <S%H8245>watch<s%> over them for <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and not for <S%H2896>good<s%>: and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, until there be an <S%H3615>end<s%> of them.

Yet a <S%H4962>small<s%> <S%H4557>number<s%> that <S%H6412>escape<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall return <S%H7725>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that are <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> there, shall <S%H3045>know<s%> whose <S%H1697>words<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>, mine, or theirs. mine: Heb. from me, or, from them

And this shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> unto you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H1697>words<s%> shall <S%H6965>surely<s%> <S%H6965>stand<s%> against you for <S%H7451>evil<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6548>Pharaohhophra<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>; as I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, his <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and that <S%H1245>sought<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>.
